organization.description:
Psycho-social rehabilitation services designed to assist individuals whose lives have been disrupted by severe and persistent mental illness to recover meaningful and productive lives through reintegration into the community and the workplace. The program provides a work-ordered day in a structured milieu therapy environment providing opportunities to combat social isolation and establish workplace expectation habits and skills. The program operates on an International Center Clubhouse Development best practice model. 

***Note: Does not provide individual or group or psycho-therapeutic counseling.***
organization.name: THE KEY CLUBHOUSE OF SOUTH FLORIDA, INC.
